member.name: M:HappyTravel.Edo.Api.Infrastructure.SupplierConnectors.ConnectorClient.ExecuteWithRetryOnUnauthorized(System.Func{System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Method covers two situations: 1. EDO has invalid token that is expired or belongs to old instance of Identity server (Identity and connectors were restarted but EDO did not) 2. EDO has valid token and connectors have invalid information about an Identity server certificate (Identity and EDO were restarted but connector did not)

member.name: M:HappyTravel.Edo.Api.Services.Accommodations.Availability.PriceAligner.AlignAggregateValues(HappyTravel.Money.Models.MoneyAmount,System.Collections.Generic.List{HappyTravel.Money.Models.MoneyAmount})
member.summary: Aligns full price with its containing parts
member.param: The parts of full price which sum must be equal to the full price
member.example:
Aggregated price - 100 USD Parts - 50 USD + 49 USD
Result will contain 100 USD as full price (aggregated) and 50 USD + 50 USD as parts.
member.exception: When aggregated price and its parts differ too much. This may be a sign of an error in client code
